Name: Kanji Islands - Learn to read Japanese
About the game: Learn over 10,000 pieces of vocabulary and 2150 Kanjis in Kanji Islands through different game mode: Kana training: Start by learning Hiraganas and Katakanas to warm up for what's to come Lessons: 100 lessons with increasing difficulty to learn all the vocabulary and Kanjis you need to read Japanese Challenges: Go through themed challenges to check your progress in the game Quick play: When you just want to go through what you already know, you can play retake vocabulary from unlocked lessons or train on your recent mistakes.
